title: Solar System in Processing - Part 3 (3D textures)
description: In part 3 of this coding challenge, using Processing, I add texture to the 3D objects created in part 2. The PShape class and createShape() functions are covered.

codeExamples.title: Solar System (3D) with Textures
codeExamples.description: Demonstration of the 3D solar system with image textures.

links.title: PeasyCam library
links.description: PeasyCam provides a dead-simple mouse-driven camera for Processing.

links.title: Planet Texture Maps
links.description: Planet Pixel Emporium is a collection of texture maps for planets and moons.
